314) National Coke & Gas Company matters, ca. 1901-02.

325) [Small bundle with few documents, not identified by archivist]
326) Matter of Samuel D. Davis & Co. bankruptcy, ca. 1903.
327) [Small bundle with few documents, not identified by archivist]

332) American Peroxide and Chemical Company matters, ca, 1905.
